# WhatsApp chat export viewer project (2025-12-30 07:41Z)

_**User (2025-12-30 07:41Z)**_

I want to make a very light weight open source project, and want to deploy this website (free/minimal charges), which picks the whatsapp chat exports and give users to option to export to to a different accessible formats with giving a whatsapp clone like UI/UX in the output. Currently, whatsapp gives an option to export, but it is combination of raw media files, and plain text with timestamps, which can be hard to follow.  Please design entire system with efficency and user data privacy in mind, since I am planning to host this site, it is my side project. User can direct upload the whatsapp's default archived file, here I can added an unarchived example of such one sample export. 

---

The user wants to create a lightweight, open-source project that:
1. Takes WhatsApp chat exports (which are typically a zip file containing a `_chat.txt` file and media files)
2. Converts them into a more accessible format with a WhatsApp-like UI/UX
3. Must be privacy-focused (client-side processing preferred)
4. Should be free/minimal cost to host
5. Should be efficient

Let me first understand the WhatsApp export format by looking at the sample files provided.

I should:
1. Read the sample `_chat.txt` to understand the format
2. Look at the media files to understand the naming convention
3. Design a system that processes everything client-side for privacy
4. Create a modern, beautiful UI that mimics WhatsApp's look

For hosting with minimal costs:
- Static site (GitHub Pages, Vercel, Netlify) - all free
- Client-side processing (no server needed for data)
- Use modern web APIs like File API, JSZip for unzipping

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
Now I understand the WhatsApp export format:
1. Messages are in format: `[MM/DD/YY, HH:MM:SS AM/PM] Sender: Message`
2. Media attachments are referenced as: `<attached: filename>` or `image omitted`
3. System messages include: "Messages and calls are end-to-end encrypted", "Voice call", etc.
4. Media files have naming convention: `NNNNN-TYPE-YYYY-MM-DD-HH-MM-SS.ext`

Now let me design a complete system:

**Architecture:**
1. **100% Client-side processing** - All parsing and rendering happens in browser
2. **No server storage** - Files never leave user's device
3. **Static site deployment** - Host on Vercel/Netlify/GitHub Pages (free)

**Tech Stack:**
- Vanilla HTML/CSS/JavaScript (lightweight, no framework needed)
- JSZip for unzipping WhatsApp exports
- html2pdf.js or jsPDF for PDF export
- Client-side only processing

**Features:**
1. Drag & drop ZIP upload
2. WhatsApp-like chat UI preview
3. Export to PDF with media embedded
4. Dark/Light theme
5. Search within chat
6. Filter by date

Let me create the project structure.</details></think>

```diff
@@ -1,1 +1,413 @@

+ /**
+  * WhatsApp Chat Parser
+  * Parses WhatsApp export format into structured data
+  * 
+  * Supports:
+  * - iOS and Android export formats
+  * - Media attachments (images, videos, audio, documents)
+  * - System messages (calls, encryption notices, etc.)
+  * - Multi-line messages
+  * - Various date formats
+  */
+ 
+ const WhatsAppParser = {
+     // Regular expressions for parsing
+     patterns: {
+         // Matches: [MM/DD/YY, HH:MM:SS AM/PM] Sender: Message
+         // or: [DD/MM/YY, HH:MM:SS] Sender: Message
+         // or: MM/DD/YY, HH:MM - Sender: Message (Android format)
+         messageStart: /^\[?(\d{1,2}\/\d{1,2}\/\d{2,4}),?\s+(\d{1,2}:\d{2}(?::\d{2})?\s*(?:AM|PM|am|pm)?)\]?\s*[-â€“]?\s*(.+?):\s*(.*)/,
+         
+         // System message pattern (no sender)
+         systemMessage: /^\[?(\d{1,2}\/\d{1,2}\/\d{2,4}),?\s+(\d{1,2}:\d{2}(?::\d{2})?\s*(?:AM|PM|am|pm)?)\]?\s*[-â€“]?\s*(.+)/,
+         
+         // Media attachment patterns
+         mediaAttached: /&lt;attached:\s*([^&gt;]+)&gt;/i,
+         mediaOmitted: /(?:image|video|audio|sticker|document|GIF)\s*omitted/i,
+         
+         // Special message patterns
+         voiceCall: /Voice call|Video call/i,
+         missedCall: /Missed.*call/i,
+         deletedMessage: /This message was deleted|You deleted this message/i,
+         encryptionNotice: /Messages and calls are end-to-end encrypted/i,
+         
+         // URL pattern
+         url: /(https?:\/\/[^\s]+)/g,
+         
+         // Document pattern
+         documentOmitted: /â€¢.*document omitted/i
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Parse the chat text content
+      * @param {string} content - Raw chat text content
+      * @param {Map} mediaFiles - Map of filename -&gt; blob/dataURL
+      * @returns {Object} Parsed chat data
+      */
+     parse(content, mediaFiles = new Map()) {
+         const lines = content.split('\n');
+         const messages = [];
+         const participants = new Map();
+         let currentMessage = null;
+         
+         for (let i = 0; i &lt; lines.length; i++) {
+             const line = lines[i];
+             
+             // Skip empty lines at the start
+             if (!line.trim() &amp;&amp; !currentMessage) continue;
+             
+             // Try to match as a new message
+             const messageMatch = line.match(this.patterns.messageStart);
+             
+             if (messageMatch) {
+                 // Save previous message if exists
+                 if (currentMessage) {
+                     messages.push(currentMessage);
+                 }
+                 
+                 const [, date, time, sender, text] = messageMatch;
+                 const timestamp = this.parseDateTime(date, time);
+                 const cleanSender = this.cleanSenderName(sender);
+                 
+                 // Track participant
+                 if (!this.isSystemSender(cleanSender)) {
+                     const count = participants.get(cleanSender) || 0;
+                     participants.set(cleanSender, count + 1);
+                 }
+                 
+                 currentMessage = {
+                     id: messages.length,
+                     timestamp,
+                     sender: cleanSender,
+                     text: text,
+                     type: this.determineMessageType(text, cleanSender),
+                     media: this.extractMedia(text, mediaFiles),
+                     isSystem: this.isSystemMessage(text, cleanSender)
+                 };
+             } else if (currentMessage) {
+                 // This is a continuation of the previous message
+                 currentMessage.text += '\n' + line;
+                 
+                 // Check for media in continuation
+                 const additionalMedia = this.extractMedia(line, mediaFiles);
+                 if (additionalMedia) {
+                     currentMessage.media = additionalMedia;
+                 }
+             } else {
+                 // Try system message without sender
+                 const systemMatch = line.match(this.patterns.systemMessage);
+                 if (systemMatch) {
+                     const [, date, time, text] = systemMatch;
+                     const timestamp = this.parseDateTime(date, time);
+                     
+                     currentMessage = {
+                         id: messages.length,
+                         timestamp,
+                         sender: 'System',
+                         text: text.trim(),
+                         type: 'system',
+                         media: null,
+                         isSystem: true
+                     };
+                 }
+             }
+         }
+         
+         // Don't forget the last message
+         if (currentMessage) {
+             messages.push(currentMessage);
+         }
+         
+         // Process messages for better display
+         const processedMessages = messages.map(msg =&gt; ({
+             ...msg,
+             text: this.processMessageText(msg.text),
+             formattedTime: this.formatTime(msg.timestamp),
+             formattedDate: this.formatDate(msg.timestamp)
+         }));
+         
+         // Get unique dates for grouping
+         const dateGroups = this.groupMessagesByDate(processedMessages);
+         
+         // Get chat statistics
+         const stats = this.calculateStats(processedMessages, participants);
+         
+         return {
+             messages: processedMessages,
+             participants: Array.from(participants.entries())
+                 .map(([name, count]) =&gt; ({ name, count }))
+                 .sort((a, b) =&gt; b.count - a.count),
+             dateGroups,
+             stats
+         };
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Parse date and time into a Date object
+      */
+     parseDateTime(dateStr, timeStr) {
+         // Handle various date formats
+         const dateParts = dateStr.split('/');
+         let month, day, year;
+         
+         // Try MM/DD/YY first (US format, common in WhatsApp)
+         if (dateParts.length === 3) {
+             month = parseInt(dateParts[0], 10);
+             day = parseInt(dateParts[1], 10);
+             year = parseInt(dateParts[2], 10);
+             
+             // Handle 2-digit year
+             if (year &lt; 100) {
+                 year += year &lt; 50 ? 2000 : 1900;
+             }
+             
+             // If month &gt; 12, assume DD/MM/YY format
+             if (month &gt; 12) {
+                 [month, day] = [day, month];
+             }
+         }
+         
+         // Parse time
+         let hours = 0, minutes = 0, seconds = 0;
+         const timeMatch = timeStr.match(/(\d{1,2}):(\d{2})(?::(\d{2}))?\s*(AM|PM|am|pm)?/);
+         
+         if (timeMatch) {
+             hours = parseInt(timeMatch[1], 10);
+             minutes = parseInt(timeMatch[2], 10);
+             seconds = timeMatch[3] ? parseInt(timeMatch[3], 10) : 0;
+             
+             const period = timeMatch[4];
+             if (period) {
+                 if (period.toUpperCase() === 'PM' &amp;&amp; hours !== 12) {
+                     hours += 12;
+                 } else if (period.toUpperCase() === 'AM' &amp;&amp; hours === 12) {
+                     hours = 0;
+                 }
+             }
+         }
+         
+         return new Date(year, month - 1, day, hours, minutes, seconds);
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Clean sender name (remove special characters, trim)
+      */
+     cleanSenderName(sender) {
+         return sender.replace(/^[~\u200e\u200f]+/, '').trim();
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Check if sender is a system sender
+      */
+     isSystemSender(sender) {
+         const systemKeywords = ['system', 'whatsapp'];
+         return systemKeywords.some(keyword =&gt; 
+             sender.toLowerCase().includes(keyword)
+         );
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Check if message is a system message
+      */
+     isSystemMessage(text, sender) {
+         if (this.isSystemSender(sender)) return true;
+         
+         return (
+             this.patterns.encryptionNotice.test(text) ||
+             this.patterns.deletedMessage.test(text) ||
+             text.includes('created group') ||
+             text.includes('added') ||
+             text.includes('left') ||
+             text.includes('removed') ||
+             text.includes('changed the subject') ||
+             text.includes('changed this group')
+         );
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Determine message type
+      */
+     determineMessageType(text, sender) {
+         if (this.isSystemMessage(text, sender)) return 'system';
+         if (this.patterns.voiceCall.test(text)) return 'call';
+         if (this.patterns.missedCall.test(text)) return 'missed_call';
+         if (this.patterns.mediaAttached.test(text)) return 'media';
+         if (this.patterns.mediaOmitted.test(text)) return 'media_omitted';
+         if (this.patterns.documentOmitted.test(text)) return 'document_omitted';
+         if (this.patterns.deletedMessage.test(text)) return 'deleted';
+         return 'text';
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Extract media information from message
+      */
+     extractMedia(text, mediaFiles) {
+         const attachedMatch = text.match(this.patterns.mediaAttached);
+         
+         if (attachedMatch) {
+             const filename = attachedMatch[1].trim();
+             const extension = filename.split('.').pop().toLowerCase();
+             const mediaData = mediaFiles.get(filename);
+             
+             return {
+                 filename,
+                 type: this.getMediaType(extension),
+                 extension,
+                 data: mediaData || null,
+                 hasData: !!mediaData
+             };
+         }
+         
+         if (this.patterns.mediaOmitted.test(text)) {
+             return {
+                 filename: null,
+                 type: 'omitted',
+                 extension: null,
+                 data: null,
+                 hasData: false
+             };
+         }
+         
+         return null;
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Get media type from extension
+      */
+     getMediaType(extension) {
+         const types = {
+             // Images
+             jpg: 'image', jpeg: 'image', png: 'image', gif: 'image', webp: 'image',
+             // Videos
+             mp4: 'video', mov: 'video', avi: 'video', '3gp': 'video',
+             // Audio
+             mp3: 'audio', ogg: 'audio', opus: 'audio', m4a: 'audio', wav: 'audio',
+             // Documents
+             pdf: 'document', doc: 'document', docx: 'document', 
+             xls: 'document', xlsx: 'document', ppt: 'document', pptx: 'document'
+         };
+         
+         return types[extension] || 'file';
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Process message text for display (linkify, clean up)
+      */
+     processMessageText(text) {
+         // Remove media attachment tags for display
+         text = text.replace(/&lt;attached:\s*[^&gt;]+&gt;/gi, '').trim();
+         
+         // Remove "image omitted" etc. for display (we show icons instead)
+         text = text.replace(/(?:image|video|audio|sticker|document|GIF)\s*omitted/gi, '').trim();
+         
+         // Remove document omitted patterns
+         text = text.replace(/â€¢.*document omitted/gi, '').trim();
+         
+         // Remove special unicode characters
+         text = text.replace(/[\u200e\u200f\u202a-\u202e]/g, '');
+         
+         return text;
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Format time for display
+      */
+     formatTime(date) {
+         if (!(date instanceof Date) || isNaN(date)) return '';
+         
+         return date.toLocaleTimeString('en-US', {
+             hour: 'numeric',
+             minute: '2-digit',
+             hour12: true
+         });
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Format date for display
+      */
+     formatDate(date) {
+         if (!(date instanceof Date) || isNaN(date)) return '';
+         
+         const today = new Date();
+         const yesterday = new Date(today);
+         yesterday.setDate(yesterday.getDate() - 1);
+         
+         if (date.toDateString() === today.toDateString()) {
+             return 'Today';
+         }
+         if (date.toDateString() === yesterday.toDateString()) {
+             return 'Yesterday';
+         }
+         
+         return date.toLocaleDateString('en-US', {
+             weekday: 'long',
+             month: 'long',
+             day: 'numeric',
+             year: date.getFullYear() !== today.getFullYear() ? 'numeric' : undefined
+         });
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Group messages by date
+      */
+     groupMessagesByDate(messages) {
+         const groups = new Map();
+         
+         messages.forEach(msg =&gt; {
+             const dateKey = msg.formattedDate;
+             if (!groups.has(dateKey)) {
+                 groups.set(dateKey, []);
+             }
+             groups.get(dateKey).push(msg);
+         });
+         
+         return groups;
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Calculate chat statistics
+      */
+     calculateStats(messages, participants) {
+         const mediaMessages = messages.filter(m =&gt; m.type === 'media' || m.type === 'media_omitted');
+         const textMessages = messages.filter(m =&gt; m.type === 'text');
+         
+         // Get date range
+         const dates = messages
+             .map(m =&gt; m.timestamp)
+             .filter(d =&gt; d instanceof Date &amp;&amp; !isNaN(d))
+             .sort((a, b) =&gt; a - b);
+         
+         const firstDate = dates[0];
+         const lastDate = dates[dates.length - 1];
+         
+         return {
+             totalMessages: messages.length,
+             textMessages: textMessages.length,
+             mediaMessages: mediaMessages.length,
+             participants: participants.size,
+             firstDate,
+             lastDate,
+             dateRange: this.formatDateRange(firstDate, lastDate)
+         };
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Format date range for display
+      */
+     formatDateRange(start, end) {
+         if (!start || !end) return '-';
+         
+         const options = { month: 'short', day: 'numeric', year: 'numeric' };
+         const startStr = start.toLocaleDateString('en-US', options);
+         const endStr = end.toLocaleDateString('en-US', options);
+         
+         if (startStr === endStr) return startStr;
+         return &#96;${startStr} - ${endStr}&#96;;
+     }
+ };
+ 
+ // Export for use in other modules
+ if (typeof module !== 'undefined' &amp;&amp; module.exports) {
+     module.exports = WhatsAppParser;
+ }
+ 
```

**Chunk 1**

```diff
@@ -1,1 +1,428 @@
- 
+ /**
+  * WhatsApp Chat Renderer
+  * Renders parsed chat data into WhatsApp-style UI
+  */
+ 
+ const ChatRenderer = {
+     // Reference to the current user (for outgoing messages)
+     currentUser: null,
+     
+     // All messages for search functionality
+     allMessages: [],
+     
+     // Media files map
+     mediaFiles: new Map(),
+ 
+     /**
+      * Initialize the renderer
+      * @param {Object} chatData - Parsed chat data
+      * @param {Map} mediaFiles - Map of media files
+      */
+     init(chatData, mediaFiles = new Map()) {
+         this.allMessages = chatData.messages;
+         this.mediaFiles = mediaFiles;
+         
+         // Determine current user (the one with most messages or first participant)
+         if (chatData.participants.length &gt; 0) {
+             // Try to identify the device owner by looking for "You" or similar patterns
+             const youParticipant = chatData.participants.find(p =&gt; 
+                 p.name.toLowerCase() === 'you' || 
+                 p.name.toLowerCase() === 'me'
+             );
+             
+             if (youParticipant) {
+                 this.currentUser = youParticipant.name;
+             } else {
+                 // Default to second participant (usually the one sending most replies)
+                 // or if only 2 participants, one is usually "You"
+                 this.currentUser = chatData.participants.length &gt; 1 
+                     ? chatData.participants[1].name 
+                     : chatData.participants[0].name;
+             }
+         }
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Render all messages to the container
+      * @param {string} containerId - ID of the container element
+      * @param {Object} chatData - Parsed chat data
+      */
+     renderMessages(containerId, chatData) {
+         const container = document.getElementById(containerId);
+         if (!container) return;
+         
+         container.innerHTML = '';
+         
+         let lastDate = null;
+         let lastSender = null;
+         
+         chatData.messages.forEach((message, index) =&gt; {
+             // Add date separator if needed
+             if (message.formattedDate !== lastDate) {
+                 container.appendChild(this.createDateSeparator(message.formattedDate));
+                 lastDate = message.formattedDate;
+                 lastSender = null; // Reset sender grouping on new day
+             }
+             
+             // Create and append message element
+             const showSender = message.sender !== lastSender &amp;&amp; !message.isSystem;
+             const messageEl = this.createMessageElement(message, showSender);
+             container.appendChild(messageEl);
+             
+             lastSender = message.sender;
+         });
+         
+         // Scroll to bottom
+         const messagesContainer = document.getElementById('messagesContainer');
+         if (messagesContainer) {
+             messagesContainer.scrollTop = messagesContainer.scrollHeight;
+         }
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Create a date separator element
+      */
+     createDateSeparator(dateText) {
+         const separator = document.createElement('div');
+         separator.className = 'date-separator';
+         separator.innerHTML = &#96;&lt;span&gt;${this.escapeHtml(dateText)}&lt;/span&gt;&#96;;
+         return separator;
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Create a message element
+      */
+     createMessageElement(message, showSender = true) {
+         const wrapper = document.createElement('div');
+         wrapper.className = &#96;message ${this.getMessageClass(message)}&#96;;
+         wrapper.dataset.messageId = message.id;
+         wrapper.dataset.timestamp = message.timestamp.getTime();
+         
+         const bubble = document.createElement('div');
+         bubble.className = 'message-bubble';
+         
+         // Add sender name for incoming messages (in groups)
+         if (showSender &amp;&amp; !message.isSystem &amp;&amp; this.getMessageClass(message) === 'incoming') {
+             const senderEl = document.createElement('div');
+             senderEl.className = 'message-sender';
+             senderEl.textContent = message.sender;
+             bubble.appendChild(senderEl);
+         }
+         
+         // Add media if present
+         if (message.media) {
+             bubble.appendChild(this.createMediaElement(message.media));
+         }
+         
+         // Add message text
+         const textEl = document.createElement('div');
+         textEl.className = 'message-text';
+         textEl.innerHTML = this.formatMessageText(message);
+         
+         if (textEl.innerHTML.trim()) {
+             bubble.appendChild(textEl);
+         }
+         
+         // Add timestamp (not for system messages)
+         if (!message.isSystem) {
+             const metaEl = document.createElement('div');
+             metaEl.className = 'message-meta';
+             metaEl.innerHTML = &#96;&lt;span class="message-time"&gt;${this.escapeHtml(message.formattedTime)}&lt;/span&gt;&#96;;
+             bubble.appendChild(metaEl);
+         }
+         
+         wrapper.appendChild(bubble);
+         return wrapper;
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Get message CSS class (incoming/outgoing/system)
+      */
+     getMessageClass(message) {
+         if (message.isSystem || message.type === 'system') {
+             return 'system';
+         }
+         
+         // Simple heuristic: if sender matches current user pattern, it's outgoing
+         // This is a best-effort approach since WhatsApp exports don't explicitly mark this
+         if (this.currentUser &amp;&amp; message.sender === this.currentUser) {
+             return 'outgoing';
+         }
+         
+         // For 1-on-1 chats, we can use message position or other heuristics
+         // Default to incoming if we can't determine
+         return 'incoming';
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Create media element
+      */
+     createMediaElement(media) {
+         const container = document.createElement('div');
+         container.className = 'message-media';
+         
+         if (media.type === 'omitted') {
+             container.innerHTML = &#96;
+                 &lt;div class="media-placeholder"&gt;
+                     &lt;svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor"&gt;
+                         &lt;path d="M21 19V5c0-1.1-.9-2-2-2H5c-1.1 0-2 .9-2 2v14c0 1.1.9 2 2 2h14c1.1 0 2-.9 2-2zM8.5 13.5l2.5 3.01L14.5 12l4.5 6H5l3.5-4.5z"/&gt;
+                     &lt;/svg&gt;
+                     &lt;span&gt;Media not included in export&lt;/span&gt;
+                 &lt;/div&gt;
+             &#96;;
+             return container;
+         }
+         
+         if (media.type === 'image' &amp;&amp; media.hasData) {
+             const img = document.createElement('img');
+             img.src = media.data;
+             img.alt = media.filename || 'Image';
+             img.loading = 'lazy';
+             img.onclick = () =&gt; this.openLightbox(media.data);
+             container.appendChild(img);
+         } else if (media.type === 'video' &amp;&amp; media.hasData) {
+             const video = document.createElement('video');
+             video.src = media.data;
+             video.controls = true;
+             video.preload = 'metadata';
+             container.appendChild(video);
+         } else if (media.type === 'audio' &amp;&amp; media.hasData) {
+             const audio = document.createElement('audio');
+             audio.src = media.data;
+             audio.controls = true;
+             container.appendChild(audio);
+         } else {
+             // File placeholder
+             container.innerHTML = &#96;
+                 &lt;div class="media-placeholder"&gt;
+                     &lt;svg viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="currentColor"&gt;
+                         &lt;path d="M14 2H6c-1.1 0-1.99.9-1.99 2L4 20c0 1.1.89 2 1.99 2H18c1.1 0 2-.9 2-2V8l-6-6zm2 16H8v-2h8v2zm0-4H8v-2h8v2zm-3-5V3.5L18.5 9H13z"/&gt;
+                     &lt;/svg&gt;
+                     &lt;span&gt;${this.escapeHtml(media.filename || 'File')}&lt;/span&gt;
+                 &lt;/div&gt;
+             &#96;;
+         }
+         
+         return container;
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Format message text with links and special formatting
+      */
+     formatMessageText(message) {
+         let text = message.text;
+         
+         // Handle special message types
+         if (message.type === 'call') {
+             return &#96;&lt;span style="opacity: 0.7"&gt;ðŸ“ž ${this.escapeHtml(text)}&lt;/span&gt;&#96;;
+         }
+         
+         if (message.type === 'missed_call') {
+             return &#96;&lt;span style="opacity: 0.7"&gt;ðŸ“µ ${this.escapeHtml(text)}&lt;/span&gt;&#96;;
+         }
+         
+         if (message.type === 'deleted') {
+             return &#96;&lt;span style="opacity: 0.5; font-style: italic"&gt;ðŸš« This message was deleted&lt;/span&gt;&#96;;
+         }
+         
+         if (message.type === 'document_omitted') {
+             return &#96;&lt;span style="opacity: 0.7"&gt;ðŸ“„ Document not included in export&lt;/span&gt;&#96;;
+         }
+         
+         // Escape HTML first
+         text = this.escapeHtml(text);
+         
+         // Convert URLs to clickable links
+         text = text.replace(
+             /(https?:\/\/[^\s&lt;]+)/gi,
+             '&lt;a href="$1" target="_blank" rel="noopener noreferrer"&gt;$1&lt;/a&gt;'
+         );
+         
+         // Convert newlines to &lt;br&gt;
+         text = text.replace(/\n/g, '&lt;br&gt;');
+         
+         // Basic WhatsApp formatting
+         // Bold: *text*
+         text = text.replace(/\*([^*]+)\*/g, '&lt;strong&gt;$1&lt;/strong&gt;');
+         // Italic: _text_
+         text = text.replace(/_([^_]+)_/g, '&lt;em&gt;$1&lt;/em&gt;');
+         // Strikethrough: ~text~
+         text = text.replace(/~([^~]+)~/g, '&lt;del&gt;$1&lt;/del&gt;');
+         // Monospace: &#96;&#96;&#96;text&#96;&#96;&#96;
+         text = text.replace(/&#96;&#96;&#96;([^&#96;]+)&#96;&#96;&#96;/g, '&lt;code&gt;$1&lt;/code&gt;');
+         
+         return text;
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Escape HTML special characters
+      */
+     escapeHtml(text) {
+         if (!text) return '';
+         const div = document.createElement('div');
+         div.textContent = text;
+         return div.innerHTML;
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Open image in lightbox
+      */
+     openLightbox(src) {
+         const lightbox = document.createElement('div');
+         lightbox.className = 'lightbox';
+         lightbox.innerHTML = &#96;&lt;img src="${src}" alt="Full size image"&gt;&#96;;
+         lightbox.onclick = () =&gt; lightbox.remove();
+         document.body.appendChild(lightbox);
+         
+         // Close on escape key
+         const handleEscape = (e) =&gt; {
+             if (e.key === 'Escape') {
+                 lightbox.remove();
+                 document.removeEventListener('keydown', handleEscape);
+             }
+         };
+         document.addEventListener('keydown', handleEscape);
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Update chat info sidebar
+      */
+     updateChatInfo(chatData, chatName) {
+         // Update stats
+         document.getElementById('msgCount').textContent = chatData.stats.totalMessages.toLocaleString();
+         document.getElementById('mediaCount').textContent = chatData.stats.mediaMessages.toLocaleString();
+         document.getElementById('dateRange').textContent = chatData.stats.dateRange;
+         
+         // Update title
+         document.getElementById('chatTitle').textContent = chatName;
+         document.getElementById('chatSubtitle').textContent = 
+             &#96;${chatData.stats.totalMessages} messages, ${chatData.participants.length} participants&#96;;
+         
+         // Update participants list
+         const participantsList = document.getElementById('participantsList');
+         participantsList.innerHTML = '';
+         
+         chatData.participants.forEach((participant, index) =&gt; {
+             const li = document.createElement('li');
+             const initials = this.getInitials(participant.name);
+             const color = this.getParticipantColor(index);
+             
+             li.innerHTML = &#96;
+                 &lt;div class="participant-avatar" style="background: ${color}"&gt;${initials}&lt;/div&gt;
+                 &lt;span class="participant-name"&gt;${this.escapeHtml(participant.name)}&lt;/span&gt;
+                 &lt;span class="participant-count"&gt;${participant.count}&lt;/span&gt;
+             &#96;;
+             participantsList.appendChild(li);
+         });
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Get initials from name
+      */
+     getInitials(name) {
+         return name
+             .split(' ')
+             .map(word =&gt; word[0])
+             .join('')
+             .toUpperCase()
+             .slice(0, 2);
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Get consistent color for participant
+      */
+     getParticipantColor(index) {
+         const colors = [
+             '#00a884', '#7c3aed', '#ea580c', '#0891b2', 
+             '#be185d', '#4f46e5', '#059669', '#dc2626'
+         ];
+         return colors[index % colors.length];
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Search messages and highlight results
+      */
+     searchMessages(query) {
+         if (!query.trim()) {
+             // Reset search - show all messages normally
+             this.renderMessages('messagesList', { messages: this.allMessages });
+             return [];
+         }
+         
+         const lowerQuery = query.toLowerCase();
+         const results = [];
+         
+         this.allMessages.forEach(msg =&gt; {
+             if (msg.text.toLowerCase().includes(lowerQuery) || 
+                 msg.sender.toLowerCase().includes(lowerQuery)) {
+                 results.push(msg);
+             }
+         });
+         
+         // Highlight matches in the UI
+         this.highlightSearchResults(query);
+         
+         return results;
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Highlight search results in the message list
+      */
+     highlightSearchResults(query) {
+         const messages = document.querySelectorAll('.message-text');
+         const regex = new RegExp(&#96;(${this.escapeRegex(query)})&#96;, 'gi');
+         
+         messages.forEach(msgEl =&gt; {
+             // Get original text (stored in data attribute or recompute)
+             const originalHtml = msgEl.innerHTML;
+             
+             // Remove existing highlights
+             const cleanHtml = originalHtml.replace(/&lt;span class="highlight"&gt;([^&lt;]+)&lt;\/span&gt;/gi, '$1');
+             
+             // Add new highlights
+             if (query.trim()) {
+                 msgEl.innerHTML = cleanHtml.replace(regex, '&lt;span class="highlight"&gt;$1&lt;/span&gt;');
+             } else {
+                 msgEl.innerHTML = cleanHtml;
+             }
+         });
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Escape special regex characters
+      */
+     escapeRegex(string) {
+         return string.replace(/[.*+?^${}()|[\]\\]/g, '\\$&amp;');
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Jump to a specific date in the chat
+      */
+     jumpToDate(date) {
+         const targetDate = new Date(date);
+         const targetDateStr = targetDate.toDateString();
+         
+         // Find the first message on that date
+         const messageEl = document.querySelector(&#96;.message[data-timestamp]&#96;);
+         const allMessages = document.querySelectorAll('.message[data-timestamp]');
+         
+         for (const msg of allMessages) {
+             const msgDate = new Date(parseInt(msg.dataset.timestamp));
+             if (msgDate.toDateString() === targetDateStr) {
+                 msg.scrollIntoView({ behavior: 'smooth', block: 'center' });
+                 msg.style.animation = 'none';
+                 msg.offsetHeight; // Trigger reflow
+                 msg.style.animation = 'messageIn 0.3s ease';
+                 return true;
+             }
+         }
+         
+         return false;
+     }
+ };
+ 
+ // Export for use in other modules
+ if (typeof module !== 'undefined' &amp;&amp; module.exports) {
+     module.exports = ChatRenderer;
+ }
+ 
```

</details>

```diff
+ /**
+  * WhatsApp Chat Exporter
+  * Handles exporting chat data to various formats (PDF, HTML)
+  */
+ 
+ const ChatExporter = {
+     /**
+      * Export chat to PDF
+      * @param {Object} chatData - Parsed chat data
+      * @param {string} chatName - Name of the chat
+      * @param {Function} onProgress - Progress callback
+      */
+     async exportToPDF(chatData, chatName, onProgress = () =&gt; {}) {
+         onProgress('Preparing document...');
+         
+         // Get jsPDF from the global scope
+         const { jsPDF } = window.jspdf;
+         
+         // Create new PDF document
+         const doc = new jsPDF({
+             orientation: 'portrait',
+             unit: 'mm',
+             format: 'a4'
+         });
+         
+         const pageWidth = doc.internal.pageSize.getWidth();
+         const pageHeight = doc.internal.pageSize.getHeight();
+         const margin = 15;
+         const contentWidth = pageWidth - (margin * 2);
+         let yPosition = margin;
+         
+         // Colors
+         const colors = {
+             primary: [0, 168, 132],      // WhatsApp green
+             outgoing: [217, 253, 211],   // Light green
+             incoming: [255, 255, 255],   // White
+             text: [17, 27, 33],          // Dark gray
+             secondary: [102, 119, 129],  // Gray
+             system: [230, 230, 230]      // Light gray
+         };
+         
+         // Helper function to add new page if needed
+         const checkNewPage = (requiredHeight = 20) =&gt; {
+             if (yPosition + requiredHeight &gt; pageHeight - margin) {
+                 doc.addPage();
+                 yPosition = margin;
+                 return true;
+             }
+             return false;
+         };
+         
+         // Helper function to draw rounded rectangle
+         const drawRoundedRect = (x, y, width, height, radius, fillColor) =&gt; {
+             doc.setFillColor(...fillColor);
+             doc.roundedRect(x, y, width, height, radius, radius, 'F');
+         };
+         
+         // ====== COVER PAGE ======
+         doc.setFillColor(0, 128, 105); // WhatsApp header green
+         doc.rect(0, 0, pageWidth, 80, 'F');
+         
+         // Title
+         doc.setTextColor(255, 255, 255);
+         doc.setFontSize(28);
+         doc.setFont('helvetica', 'bold');
+         doc.text('WhatsApp Chat Export', pageWidth / 2, 35, { align: 'center' });
+         
+         // Chat name
+         doc.setFontSize(16);
+         doc.setFont('helvetica', 'normal');
+         doc.text(chatName, pageWidth / 2, 50, { align: 'center' });
+         
+         // Stats section
+         yPosition = 100;
+         doc.setTextColor(...colors.text);
+         doc.setFontSize(12);
+         
+         const stats = [
+             ['Total Messages', chatData.stats.totalMessages.toLocaleString()],
+             ['Media Files', chatData.stats.mediaMessages.toLocaleString()],
+             ['Participants', chatData.participants.length.toString()],
+             ['Date Range', chatData.stats.dateRange]
+         ];
+         
+         stats.forEach(([label, value]) =&gt; {
+             doc.setFont('helvetica', 'normal');
+             doc.setTextColor(...colors.secondary);
+             doc.text(label + ':', margin, yPosition);
+             doc.setFont('helvetica', 'bold');
+             doc.setTextColor(...colors.text);
+             doc.text(value, margin + 45, yPosition);
+             yPosition += 8;
+         });
+         
+         // Participants list
+         yPosition += 10;
+         doc.setFont('helvetica', 'bold');
+         doc.setTextColor(...colors.text);
+         doc.text('Participants:', margin, yPosition);
+         yPosition += 8;
+         
+         doc.setFont('helvetica', 'normal');
+         chatData.participants.slice(0, 10).forEach(p =&gt; {
+             doc.setTextColor(...colors.secondary);
+             doc.text(&#96;â€¢ ${p.name} (${p.count} messages)&#96;, margin + 5, yPosition);
+             yPosition += 6;
+         });
+         
+         if (chatData.participants.length &gt; 10) {
+             doc.text(&#96;... and ${chatData.participants.length - 10} more&#96;, margin + 5, yPosition);
+         }
+         
+         // Privacy notice
+         yPosition = pageHeight - 30;
+         doc.setFontSize(9);
+         doc.setTextColor(...colors.secondary);
+         doc.text('Generated by WhatsApp Chat Viewer â€¢ Your data never left your device', pageWidth / 2, yPosition, { align: 'center' });
+         doc.text(new Date().toLocaleDateString(), pageWidth / 2, yPosition + 5, { align: 'center' });
+         
+         // ====== MESSAGE PAGES ======
+         doc.addPage();
+         yPosition = margin;
+         
+         let lastDate = null;
+         const totalMessages = chatData.messages.length;
+         
+         for (let i = 0; i &lt; totalMessages; i++) {
+             const message = chatData.messages[i];
+             
+             // Update progress every 50 messages
+             if (i % 50 === 0) {
+                 onProgress(&#96;Processing message ${i + 1} of ${totalMessages}...&#96;);
+             }
+             
+             // Date separator
+             if (message.formattedDate !== lastDate) {
+                 checkNewPage(15);
+                 
+                 const dateText = message.formattedDate;
+                 const dateWidth = doc.getStringUnitWidth(dateText) * 10 / doc.internal.scaleFactor + 10;
+                 const dateX = (pageWidth - dateWidth) / 2;
+                 
+                 drawRoundedRect(dateX, yPosition, dateWidth, 7, 3, colors.system);
+                 doc.setFontSize(9);
+                 doc.setTextColor(...colors.secondary);
+                 doc.text(dateText, pageWidth / 2, yPosition + 5, { align: 'center' });
+                 
+                 yPosition += 12;
+                 lastDate = message.formattedDate;
+             }
+             
+             // Skip system messages for cleaner output (optional)
+             if (message.isSystem) {
+                 checkNewPage(10);
+                 doc.setFontSize(8);
+                 doc.setTextColor(...colors.secondary);
+                 const systemText = doc.splitTextToSize(message.text || 'System message', contentWidth - 40);
+                 doc.text(systemText, pageWidth / 2, yPosition + 4, { align: 'center' });
+                 yPosition += systemText.length * 4 + 6;
+                 continue;
+             }
+             
+             // Prepare message content
+             const isOutgoing = message.sender === ChatRenderer.currentUser;
+             const bubbleColor = isOutgoing ? colors.outgoing : colors.incoming;
+             const maxBubbleWidth = contentWidth * 0.7;
+             
+             // Calculate message dimensions
+             doc.setFontSize(10);
+             const senderText = message.sender;
+             const messageText = message.text || '';
+             const timeText = message.formattedTime;
+             
+             // Wrap message text
+             const wrappedText = doc.splitTextToSize(messageText, maxBubbleWidth - 10);
+             
+             // Calculate bubble height
+             let bubbleHeight = 8; // Base padding
+             if (!isOutgoing) bubbleHeight += 5; // Sender name
+             if (messageText) bubbleHeight += wrappedText.length * 4;
+             if (message.media) bubbleHeight += 8; // Media indicator
+             bubbleHeight += 4; // Time
+             
+             // Check for new page
+             checkNewPage(bubbleHeight + 5);
+             
+             // Draw bubble
+             const bubbleWidth = Math.min(maxBubbleWidth, 
+                 Math.max(
+                     doc.getStringUnitWidth(messageText.substring(0, 50)) * 10 / doc.internal.scaleFactor + 20,
+                     60
+                 )
+             );
+             const bubbleX = isOutgoing ? pageWidth - margin - bubbleWidth : margin;
+             
+             drawRoundedRect(bubbleX, yPosition, bubbleWidth, bubbleHeight, 3, bubbleColor);
+             
+             // Draw border for incoming messages
+             if (!isOutgoing) {
+                 doc.setDrawColor(220, 220, 220);
+                 doc.roundedRect(bubbleX, yPosition, bubbleWidth, bubbleHeight, 3, 3, 'S');
+             }
+             
+             let textY = yPosition + 5;
+             
+             // Sender name (for incoming messages)
+             if (!isOutgoing) {
+                 doc.setFontSize(9);
+                 doc.setTextColor(...colors.primary);
+                 doc.setFont('helvetica', 'bold');
+                 doc.text(senderText, bubbleX + 5, textY);
+                 textY += 5;
+             }
+             
+             // Media indicator
+             if (message.media) {
+                 doc.setFontSize(8);
+                 doc.setTextColor(...colors.secondary);
+                 doc.setFont('helvetica', 'italic');
+                 const mediaText = message.media.type === 'omitted' 
+                     ? 'ðŸ“· Media not included' 
+                     : &#96;ðŸ“Ž ${message.media.filename || 'Media'}&#96;;
+                 doc.text(mediaText, bubbleX + 5, textY);
+                 textY += 5;
+             }
+             
+             // Message text
+             if (messageText) {
+                 doc.setFontSize(10);
+                 doc.setTextColor(...colors.text);
+                 doc.setFont('helvetica', 'normal');
+                 doc.text(wrappedText, bubbleX + 5, textY);
+                 textY += wrappedText.length * 4;
+             }
+             
+             // Time
+             doc.setFontSize(7);
+             doc.setTextColor(...colors.secondary);
+             doc.text(timeText, bubbleX + bubbleWidth - 5 - doc.getStringUnitWidth(timeText) * 7 / doc.internal.scaleFactor, textY + 2);
+             
+             yPosition += bubbleHeight + 3;
+         }
+         
+         // ====== SAVE PDF ======
+         onProgress('Generating PDF file...');
+         
+         const filename = &#96;${chatName.replace(/[^a-z0-9]/gi, '_')}_chat_export.pdf&#96;;
+         doc.save(filename);
+         
+         onProgress('Complete!');
+         return filename;
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Export chat to standalone HTML file
+      * @param {Object} chatData - Parsed chat data
+      * @param {string} chatName - Name of the chat
+      * @param {Map} mediaFiles - Map of media files
+      */
+     async exportToHTML(chatData, chatName, mediaFiles = new Map()) {
+         // Generate HTML content
+         const html = this.generateHTMLExport(chatData, chatName, mediaFiles);
+         
+         // Create blob and download
+         const blob = new Blob([html], { type: 'text/html;charset=utf-8' });
+         const url = URL.createObjectURL(blob);
+         
+         const a = document.createElement('a');
+         a.href = url;
+         a.download = &#96;${chatName.replace(/[^a-z0-9]/gi, '_')}_chat_export.html&#96;;
+         document.body.appendChild(a);
+         a.click();
+         document.body.removeChild(a);
+         
+         URL.revokeObjectURL(url);
+         
+         return a.download;
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Generate standalone HTML export
+      */
+     generateHTMLExport(chatData, chatName, mediaFiles) {
+         const currentUser = ChatRenderer.currentUser;
+         
+         // Generate messages HTML
+         let messagesHtml = '';
+         let lastDate = null;
+         
+         chatData.messages.forEach(message =&gt; {
+             // Date separator
+             if (message.formattedDate !== lastDate) {
+                 messagesHtml += &#96;&lt;div class="date-sep"&gt;&lt;span&gt;${this.escapeHtml(message.formattedDate)}&lt;/span&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&#96;;
+                 lastDate = message.formattedDate;
+             }
+             
+             const msgClass = message.isSystem ? 'system' : 
+                 (message.sender === currentUser ? 'outgoing' : 'incoming');
+             
+             let mediaHtml = '';
+             if (message.media) {
+                 if (message.media.type === 'image' &amp;&amp; message.media.hasData) {
+                     mediaHtml = &#96;&lt;div class="media"&gt;&lt;img src="${message.media.data}" alt="Image"&gt;&lt;/div&gt;&#96;;
+                 } else if (message.media.type === 'omitted') {
+                     mediaHtml = &#96;&lt;div class="media-placeholder"&gt;ðŸ“· Media not included&lt;/div&gt;&#96;;
+                 } else if (message.media.hasData) {
+                     mediaHtml = &#96;&lt;div class="media-placeholder"&gt;ðŸ“Ž ${this.escapeHtml(message.media.filename)}&lt;/div&gt;&#96;;
+                 }
+             }
+             
+             const senderHtml = msgClass === 'incoming' &amp;&amp; !message.isSystem 
+                 ? &#96;&lt;div class="sender"&gt;${this.escapeHtml(message.sender)}&lt;/div&gt;&#96; 
+                 : '';
+             
+             const textHtml = message.text 
+                 ? &#96;&lt;div class="text"&gt;${this.formatTextForExport(message.text)}&lt;/div&gt;&#96; 
+                 : '';
+             
+             const timeHtml = !message.isSystem 
+                 ? &#96;&lt;div class="time"&gt;${this.escapeHtml(message.formattedTime)}&lt;/div&gt;&#96; 
+                 : '';
+             
+             messagesHtml += &#96;
+                 &lt;div class="msg ${msgClass}"&gt;
+                     &lt;div class="bubble"&gt;
+                         ${senderHtml}
+                         ${mediaHtml}
+                         ${textHtml}
+                         ${timeHtml}
+                     &lt;/div&gt;
+                 &lt;/div&gt;
+             &#96;;
+         });
+         
+         // Generate full HTML document
+         return &#96;&lt;!DOCTYPE html&gt;
+ &lt;html lang="en"&gt;
+ &lt;head&gt;
+     &lt;meta charset="UTF-8"&gt;
+     &lt;meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0"&gt;
+     &lt;title&gt;${this.escapeHtml(chatName)} - Chat Export&lt;/title&gt;
+     &lt;style&gt;
+         * { box-sizing: border-box; margin: 0; padding: 0; }
+         body {
+             font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, 'Segoe UI', Roboto, sans-serif;
+             background: #efeae2;
+             background-image: url("data:image/svg+xml,%3Csvg width='60' height='60' viewBox='0 0 60 60' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg'%3E%3Cg fill='none' fill-rule='evenodd'%3E%3Cg fill='%23d1d7db' fill-opacity='0.15'%3E%3Cpath d='M36 34v-4h-2v4h-4v2h4v4h2v-4h4v-2h-4zm0-30V0h-2v4h-4v2h4v4h2V6h4V4h-4zM6 34v-4H4v4H0v2h4v4h2v-4h4v-2H6zM6 4V0H4v4H0v2h4v4h2V6h4V4H6z'/%3E%3C/g%3E%3C/g%3E%3C/svg%3E");
+             min-height: 100vh;
+         }
+         .header {
+             background: #008069;
+             color: white;
+             padding: 16px 20px;
+             position: sticky;
+             top: 0;
+             z-index: 100;
+         }
+         .header h1 { font-size: 18px; font-weight: 600; }
+         .header p { font-size: 13px; opacity: 0.9; margin-top: 4px; }
+         .container {
+             max-width: 900px;
+             margin: 0 auto;
+             padding: 16px;
+         }
+         .msg {
+             display: flex;
+             margin-bottom: 4px;
+         }
+         .msg.outgoing { justify-content: flex-end; }
+         .msg.incoming { justify-content: flex-start; }
+         .msg.system { justify-content: center; }
+         .bubble {
+             max-width: 65%;
+             padding: 6px 10px;
+             border-radius: 8px;
+             box-shadow: 0 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
+         }
+         .msg.outgoing .bubble {
+             background: #d9fdd3;
+             border-bottom-right-radius: 3px;
+         }
+         .msg.incoming .bubble {
+             background: white;
+             border-bottom-left-radius: 3px;
+         }
+         .msg.system .bubble {
+             background: rgba(255,255,255,0.9);
+             font-size: 12px;
+             color: #667781;
+             padding: 5px 12px;
+             border-radius: 8px;
+             max-width: 80%;
+         }
+         .sender {
+             font-size: 13px;
+             font-weight: 600;
+             color: #00a884;
+             margin-bottom: 2px;
+         }
+         .text {
+             font-size: 14px;
+             line-height: 1.4;
+             word-wrap: break-word;
+             color: #111b21;
+         }
+         .text a { color: #039be5; }
+         .time {
+             font-size: 11px;
+             color: #667781;
+             text-align: right;
+             margin-top: 2px;
+         }
+         .media img {
+             max-width: 100%;
+             border-radius: 6px;
+             margin-bottom: 4px;
+         }
+         .media-placeholder {
+             background: #f0f2f5;
+             padding: 12px;
+             border-radius: 6px;
+             font-size: 13px;
+             color: #667781;
+             margin-bottom: 4px;
+         }
+         .date-sep {
+             display: flex;
+             justify-content: center;
+             margin: 16px 0;
+         }
+         .date-sep span {
+             background: rgba(255,255,255,0.9);
+             padding: 5px 12px;
+             border-radius: 8px;
+             font-size: 12px;
+             color: #667781;
+             box-shadow: 0 1px 1px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
+         }
+         .footer {
+             text-align: center;
+             padding: 20px;
+             font-size: 12px;
+             color: #667781;
+         }
+         @media (max-width: 600px) {
+             .bubble { max-width: 85%; }
+         }
+         @media print {
+             .header { position: static; }
+             body { background: white; background-image: none; }
+         }
+     &lt;/style&gt;
+ &lt;/head&gt;
+ &lt;body&gt;
+     &lt;div class="header"&gt;
+         &lt;h1&gt;${this.escapeHtml(chatName)}&lt;/h1&gt;
+         &lt;p&gt;${chatData.stats.totalMessages.toLocaleString()} messages â€¢ ${chatData.stats.dateRange}&lt;/p&gt;
+     &lt;/div&gt;
+     &lt;div class="container"&gt;
+         ${messagesHtml}
+     &lt;/div&gt;
+     &lt;div class="footer"&gt;
+         Generated by WhatsApp Chat Viewer â€¢ ${new Date().toLocaleDateString()}
+     &lt;/div&gt;
+ &lt;/body&gt;
+ &lt;/html&gt;&#96;;
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Format text for HTML export
+      */
+     formatTextForExport(text) {
+         // Escape HTML
+         text = this.escapeHtml(text);
+         
+         // Convert URLs to links
+         text = text.replace(
+             /(https?:\/\/[^\s&lt;]+)/gi,
+             '&lt;a href="$1" target="_blank"&gt;$1&lt;/a&gt;'
+         );
+         
+         // Convert newlines
+         text = text.replace(/\n/g, '&lt;br&gt;');
+         
+         return text;
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Escape HTML special characters
+      */
+     escapeHtml(text) {
+         if (!text) return '';
+         const div = document.createElement('div');
+         div.textContent = text;
+         return div.innerHTML;
+     }
+ };
+ 
+ // Export for use in other modules
+ if (typeof module !== 'undefined' &amp;&amp; module.exports) {
+     module.exports = ChatExporter;
+ }
+ 
```

```diff
+  * WhatsApp Chat Viewer - Main Application

+  */
+ 
+ const App = {
+     // State
+     chatData: null,
+     chatName: '',
+     mediaFiles: new Map(),
+     
+     // DOM elements
+     elements: {},
+ 
+     /**
+      * Initialize the application
+      */

+         this.cacheElements();
+         this.bindEvents();
+         this.initTheme();
+         console.log('WhatsApp Chat Viewer initialized');
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Cache DOM elements for performance
+      */
+     cacheElements() {
+         this.elements = {
+             uploadSection: document.getElementById('uploadSection'),
+             chatSection: document.getElementById('chatSection'),
+             dropzone: document.getElementById('dropzone'),
+             fileInput: document.getElementById('fileInput'),
+             loadingOverlay: document.getElementById('loadingOverlay'),
+             loadingText: document.getElementById('loadingText'),
+             messagesList: document.getElementById('messagesList'),
+             searchInput: document.getElementById('searchInput'),
+             themeToggle: document.getElementById('themeToggle'),
+             backBtn: document.getElementById('backBtn'),
+             exportPdf: document.getElementById('exportPdf'),
+             exportHtml: document.getElementById('exportHtml'),
+             jumpToDate: document.getElementById('jumpToDate'),
+             datePickerModal: document.getElementById('datePickerModal'),
+             closeDatePicker: document.getElementById('closeDatePicker'),
+             jumpDateInput: document.getElementById('jumpDateInput'),
+             jumpToDateBtn: document.getElementById('jumpToDateBtn')
+         };
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Bind event listeners
+      */
+     bindEvents() {
+         // Dropzone events
+         this.elements.dropzone.addEventListener('click', () =&gt; {
+             this.elements.fileInput.click();
+         });
+         
+         this.elements.dropzone.addEventListener('dragover', (e) =&gt; {
+             e.preventDefault();
+             e.stopPropagation();
+             this.elements.dropzone.classList.add('drag-over');
+         });
+         
+         this.elements.dropzone.addEventListener('dragleave', (e) =&gt; {
+             e.preventDefault();
+             e.stopPropagation();
+             this.elements.dropzone.classList.remove('drag-over');
+         });
+         
+         this.elements.dropzone.addEventListener('drop', (e) =&gt; {
+             e.preventDefault();
+             e.stopPropagation();
+             this.elements.dropzone.classList.remove('drag-over');
+             this.handleFiles(e.dataTransfer.files);
+         });
+         
+         this.elements.fileInput.addEventListener('change', (e) =&gt; {
+             this.handleFiles(e.target.files);
+         });
+         
+         // Theme toggle
+         this.elements.themeToggle.addEventListener('click', () =&gt; {
+             this.toggleTheme();
+         });
+         
+         // Back button
+         this.elements.backBtn.addEventListener('click', () =&gt; {
+             this.resetToUpload();
+         });
+         
+         // Export buttons
+         this.elements.exportPdf.addEventListener('click', () =&gt; {
+             this.exportToPDF();
+         });
+         
+         this.elements.exportHtml.addEventListener('click', () =&gt; {
+             this.exportToHTML();
+         });
+         
+         // Search
+         let searchTimeout;
+         this.elements.searchInput.addEventListener('input', (e) =&gt; {
+             clearTimeout(searchTimeout);
+             searchTimeout = setTimeout(() =&gt; {
+                 ChatRenderer.searchMessages(e.target.value);
+             }, 300);
+         });
+         
+         // Date picker
+         this.elements.jumpToDate.addEventListener('click', () =&gt; {
+             this.elements.datePickerModal.style.display = 'flex';
+         });
+         
+         this.elements.closeDatePicker.addEventListener('click', () =&gt; {
+             this.elements.datePickerModal.style.display = 'none';
+         });
+         
+         this.elements.jumpToDateBtn.addEventListener('click', () =&gt; {
+             const date = this.elements.jumpDateInput.value;
+             if (date) {
+                 ChatRenderer.jumpToDate(date);
+                 this.elements.datePickerModal.style.display = 'none';
+             }
+         });
+         
+         // Close modal on outside click
+         this.elements.datePickerModal.addEventListener('click', (e) =&gt; {
+             if (e.target === this.elements.datePickerModal) {
+                 this.elements.datePickerModal.style.display = 'none';
+             }
+         });
+         
+         // Keyboard shortcuts
+         document.addEventListener('keydown', (e) =&gt; {
+             // Escape to close modals
+             if (e.key === 'Escape') {
+                 this.elements.datePickerModal.style.display = 'none';
+             }
+             
+             // Ctrl/Cmd + F to focus search
+             if ((e.ctrlKey || e.metaKey) &amp;&amp; e.key === 'f' &amp;&amp; this.chatData) {
+                 e.preventDefault();
+                 this.elements.searchInput.focus();
+             }
+         });
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Initialize theme from localStorage or system preference
+      */
+     initTheme() {
+         const savedTheme = localStorage.getItem('theme');
+         const prefersDark = window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').matches;
+         
+         if (savedTheme) {
+             document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', savedTheme);
+         } else if (prefersDark) {
+             document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', 'dark');
+         }
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Toggle between light and dark theme
+      */
+     toggleTheme() {
+         const currentTheme = document.documentElement.getAttribute('data-theme');
+         const newTheme = currentTheme === 'dark' ? 'light' : 'dark';
+         
+         document.documentElement.setAttribute('data-theme', newTheme);
+         localStorage.setItem('theme', newTheme);
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Handle uploaded files
+      */
+     async handleFiles(files) {
+         if (!files || files.length === 0) return;
+         
+         this.showLoading('Reading files...');
+         
+         try {
+             // Check if it's a ZIP file
+             const file = files[0];
+             
+             if (file.name.endsWith('.zip')) {
+                 await this.processZipFile(file);
+             } else if (file.name.endsWith('.txt')) {
+                 // Handle raw text file (multiple files might be uploaded)
+                 await this.processTextAndMedia(files);
+             } else {
+                 throw new Error('Please upload a .zip file or _chat.txt file');
+             }
+         } catch (error) {
+             console.error('Error processing files:', error);
+             alert(&#96;Error: ${error.message}&#96;);
+             this.hideLoading();
+         }
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Process a ZIP file
+      */
+     async processZipFile(file) {
+         this.showLoading('Extracting ZIP archive...');
+         
+         const zip = await JSZip.loadAsync(file);
+         let chatContent = null;
+         this.mediaFiles = new Map();
+         
+         // Extract chat name from ZIP filename
+         this.chatName = file.name.replace('.zip', '').replace('WhatsApp Chat - ', '');
+         
+         // Process all files in the ZIP
+         const filePromises = [];
+         
+         zip.forEach((relativePath, zipEntry) =&gt; {
+             if (zipEntry.dir) return;
+             
+             const filename = relativePath.split('/').pop();
+             
+             if (filename === '_chat.txt' || filename.endsWith('.txt')) {
+                 // Chat text file
+                 filePromises.push(
+                     zipEntry.async('string').then(content =&gt; {
+                         if (!chatContent || filename === '_chat.txt') {
+                             chatContent = content;
+                         }
+                     })
+                 );
+             } else if (this.isMediaFile(filename)) {
+                 // Media file
+                 filePromises.push(
+                     zipEntry.async('base64').then(data =&gt; {
+                         const mimeType = this.getMimeType(filename);
+                         const dataUrl = &#96;data:${mimeType};base64,${data}&#96;;
+                         this.mediaFiles.set(filename, dataUrl);
+                     })
+                 );
+             }
+         });
+         
+         await Promise.all(filePromises);
+         
+         if (!chatContent) {
+             throw new Error('No chat text file found in the ZIP archive');
+         }
+         
+         this.showLoading('Parsing chat messages...');
+         await this.parseAndRender(chatContent);
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Process text file and optional media files
+      */
+     async processTextAndMedia(files) {
+         this.showLoading('Processing files...');
+         
+         let chatContent = null;
+         this.mediaFiles = new Map();
+         
+         for (const file of files) {
+             if (file.name.endsWith('.txt')) {
+                 chatContent = await this.readFileAsText(file);
+                 this.chatName = file.name.replace('.txt', '').replace('_chat', '');
+             } else if (this.isMediaFile(file.name)) {
+                 const dataUrl = await this.readFileAsDataURL(file);
+                 this.mediaFiles.set(file.name, dataUrl);
+             }
+         }
+         
+         if (!chatContent) {
+             throw new Error('No chat text file found');
+         }
+         
+         await this.parseAndRender(chatContent);
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Parse chat content and render UI
+      */
+     async parseAndRender(chatContent) {
+         this.showLoading('Parsing messages...');
+         
+         // Parse the chat
+         this.chatData = WhatsAppParser.parse(chatContent, this.mediaFiles);
+         
+         console.log(&#96;Parsed ${this.chatData.messages.length} messages&#96;);
+         console.log(&#96;Found ${this.chatData.participants.length} participants&#96;);
+         console.log(&#96;Media files: ${this.mediaFiles.size}&#96;);
+         
+         this.showLoading('Rendering chat...');
+         
+         // Initialize renderer
+         ChatRenderer.init(this.chatData, this.mediaFiles);
+         
+         // Update UI
+         ChatRenderer.updateChatInfo(this.chatData, this.chatName);
+         ChatRenderer.renderMessages('messagesList', this.chatData);
+         
+         // Set date picker min/max
+         if (this.chatData.stats.firstDate) {
+             this.elements.jumpDateInput.min = this.formatDateForInput(this.chatData.stats.firstDate);
+             this.elements.jumpDateInput.max = this.formatDateForInput(this.chatData.stats.lastDate);
+             this.elements.jumpDateInput.value = this.formatDateForInput(this.chatData.stats.firstDate);
+         }
+         
+         // Show chat section
+         this.elements.uploadSection.style.display = 'none';
+         this.elements.chatSection.style.display = 'flex';
+         
+         this.hideLoading();
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Export to PDF
+      */
+     async exportToPDF() {
+         if (!this.chatData) return;
+         
+         this.showLoading('Generating PDF...');
+         
+         try {
+             const filename = await ChatExporter.exportToPDF(
+                 this.chatData,
+                 this.chatName,
+                 (progress) =&gt; this.showLoading(progress)
+             );
+             console.log(&#96;PDF exported: ${filename}&#96;);
+         } catch (error) {
+             console.error('PDF export error:', error);
+             alert(&#96;Export failed: ${error.message}&#96;);
+         }
+         
+         this.hideLoading();
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Export to HTML
+      */
+     async exportToHTML() {
+         if (!this.chatData) return;
+         
+         this.showLoading('Generating HTML...');
+         
+         try {
+             const filename = await ChatExporter.exportToHTML(
+                 this.chatData,
+                 this.chatName,
+                 this.mediaFiles
+             );
+             console.log(&#96;HTML exported: ${filename}&#96;);
+         } catch (error) {
+             console.error('HTML export error:', error);
+             alert(&#96;Export failed: ${error.message}&#96;);
+         }
+         
+         this.hideLoading();
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Reset to upload view
+      */
+     resetToUpload() {
+         this.chatData = null;
+         this.chatName = '';
+         this.mediaFiles = new Map();
+         this.elements.fileInput.value = '';
+         this.elements.searchInput.value = '';
+         
+         this.elements.chatSection.style.display = 'none';
+         this.elements.uploadSection.style.display = 'flex';
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Show loading overlay
+      */
+     showLoading(message = 'Loading...') {
+         this.elements.loadingText.textContent = message;
+         this.elements.loadingOverlay.style.display = 'flex';
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Hide loading overlay
+      */
+     hideLoading() {
+         this.elements.loadingOverlay.style.display = 'none';
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Read file as text
+      */
+     readFileAsText(file) {
+         return new Promise((resolve, reject) =&gt; {
+             const reader = new FileReader();
+             reader.onload = () =&gt; resolve(reader.result);
+             reader.onerror = () =&gt; reject(reader.error);
+             reader.readAsText(file);
+         });
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Read file as data URL
+      */
+     readFileAsDataURL(file) {
+         return new Promise((resolve, reject) =&gt; {
+             const reader = new FileReader();
+             reader.onload = () =&gt; resolve(reader.result);
+             reader.onerror = () =&gt; reject(reader.error);
+             reader.readAsDataURL(file);
+         });
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Check if file is a media file
+      */
+     isMediaFile(filename) {
+         const mediaExtensions = [
+             'jpg', 'jpeg', 'png', 'gif', 'webp',
+             'mp4', 'mov', 'avi', '3gp',
+             'mp3', 'ogg', 'opus', 'm4a', 'wav',
+             'pdf', 'doc', 'docx'
+         ];
+         const ext = filename.split('.').pop().toLowerCase();
+         return mediaExtensions.includes(ext);
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Get MIME type for file
+      */
+     getMimeType(filename) {
+         const ext = filename.split('.').pop().toLowerCase();
+         const mimeTypes = {
+             // Images
+             jpg: 'image/jpeg',
+             jpeg: 'image/jpeg',
+             png: 'image/png',
+             gif: 'image/gif',
+             webp: 'image/webp',
+             // Videos
+             mp4: 'video/mp4',
+             mov: 'video/quicktime',
+             avi: 'video/x-msvideo',
+             '3gp': 'video/3gpp',
+             // Audio
+             mp3: 'audio/mpeg',
+             ogg: 'audio/ogg',
+             opus: 'audio/opus',
+             m4a: 'audio/mp4',
+             wav: 'audio/wav',
+             // Documents
+             pdf: 'application/pdf',
+             doc: 'application/msword',
+             docx: 'application/vnd.openxmlformats-officedocument.wordprocessingml.document'
+         };
+         return mimeTypes[ext] || 'application/octet-stream';
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Format date for input element
+      */
+     formatDateForInput(date) {
+         if (!(date instanceof Date)) return '';
+         return date.toISOString().split('T')[0];
+     }
+ };
+ 
+ // Initialize app when DOM is ready
+ document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () =&gt; {
+     App.init();
+ });
+ 
```

</details>

</tool-use>

I've built a complete, **privacy-first WhatsApp Chat Viewer** for you. Here's what was created:

## ðŸŽ‰ Project Complete!

### Files Created:

| File | Purpose |
|------|---------|
| `index.html` | Main HTML with semantic structure |
| `styles.css` | Beautiful WhatsApp-inspired styling with dark/light themes |
| `parser.js` | WhatsApp export format parser (handles timestamps, media, system msgs) |
| `renderer.js` | Chat UI renderer with message bubbles |
| `exporter.js` | PDF and HTML export functionality |
| `app.js` | Main application logic, drag-drop, ZIP extraction |
| `README.md` | Documentation with deployment instructions |
| `LICENSE` | MIT License |
| `.gitignore` | Ignores OS files and sample data |

### Key Features:
- **ðŸ”’ 100% Privacy**: All processing happens client-side â€” nothing ever leaves the user's browser
- **ðŸ“± WhatsApp-Style UI**: Authentic message bubbles, timestamps, and media display  
- **ðŸŒ™ Dark/Light Themes**: Auto-detects system preference with manual toggle
- **ðŸ“„ PDF Export**: Generates print-ready PDFs with chat history
- **ðŸŒ HTML Export**: Standalone HTML files with embedded media
- **ðŸ” Search**: Real-time message search with highlighting
- **âš¡ Zero Dependencies**: Pure HTML/CSS/JS (libraries from CDN)

### Free Deployment Options:

1. **GitHub Pages** (easiest) - Just push to GitHub and enable Pages
2. **Vercel** - Connect your repo and auto-deploy
3. **Netlify** - Drag-and-drop or connect repo
4. **Cloudflare Pages** - Another free option

### Test Locally:
The server is running at `http://localhost:3457`

### To Deploy:

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
Now I see the issues. Let me analyze each problem:

1. **Folder upload issue**: 
   - The file input is set to `accept=".zip,.txt"` which might not allow selecting multiple files of different types
   - The `handleFiles` function checks only the first file - if it's a txt file, it processes all files, but if it's NOT a txt file or zip, it throws an error
   - Need to allow multiple file selection and better handling

2. **ZIP file - only 1 out of 3 images displayed**:
   - Looking at the sample chat, I see filenames like `00000011-PHOTO-2025-12-28-20-57-03.jpg`
   - The parser looks for `<attached: filename>` pattern
   - The issue might be that the filename extraction from the chat text doesn't match exactly with the actual filename in the ZIP
   - Need to debug the filename matching

3. **PDF export broken**:
   - The jsPDF code is quite basic and doesn't handle text wrapping well
   - Need to completely rewrite the PDF exporter to be more robust

**Chunk 5**

```diff
@@ -146,4 +158,74 @@
          });
      },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Handle DataTransfer items (for folder drag and drop)
+      */
+     async handleDataTransferItems(items) {
+         const files = [];
+         const promises = [];
+         
+         for (let i = 0; i &lt; items.length; i++) {
+             const item = items[i];
+             if (item.kind === 'file') {
+                 const entry = item.webkitGetAsEntry ? item.webkitGetAsEntry() : null;
+                 if (entry) {
+                     if (entry.isDirectory) {
+                         promises.push(this.readDirectory(entry, files));
+                     } else {
+                         const file = item.getAsFile();
+                         if (file) files.push(file);
+                     }
+                 } else {
+                     const file = item.getAsFile();
+                     if (file) files.push(file);
+                 }
+             }
+         }
+         
+         await Promise.all(promises);
+         
+         if (files.length &gt; 0) {
+             await this.handleFiles(files);
+         }
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Recursively read directory entries
+      */
+     readDirectory(dirEntry, files) {
+         return new Promise((resolve) =&gt; {
+             const reader = dirEntry.createReader();
+             const readEntries = () =&gt; {
+                 reader.readEntries(async (entries) =&gt; {
+                     if (entries.length === 0) {
+                         resolve();
+                         return;
+                     }
+                     
+                     for (const entry of entries) {
+                         if (entry.isFile) {
+                             const file = await this.getFileFromEntry(entry);
+                             if (file) files.push(file);
+                         } else if (entry.isDirectory) {
+                             await this.readDirectory(entry, files);
+                         }
+                     }
+                     
+                     readEntries();
+                 });
+             };
+             readEntries();
+         });
+     },
+ 
+     /**
+      * Get File from FileEntry
+      */
+     getFileFromEntry(fileEntry) {
+         return new Promise((resolve) =&gt; {
+             fileEntry.file(resolve, () =&gt; resolve(null));
+         });
+     },
  
      /**
```

```diff
+             // Try exact match first
+             let mediaData = mediaFiles.get(filename);

+             // If no exact match, try fuzzy matching (WhatsApp sometimes changes filenames slightly)
+             if (!mediaData &amp;&amp; mediaFiles.size &gt; 0) {
+                 // Try to find a file that contains most of the filename parts
+                 const filenameLower = filename.toLowerCase();
+                 const filenameParts = filename.replace(/\.[^.]+$/, '').split(/[-_]/);
+                 
+                 for (const [key, value] of mediaFiles) {
+                     const keyLower = key.toLowerCase();
+                     // Check if the key matches the filename (case-insensitive)
+                     if (keyLower === filenameLower) {
+                         mediaData = value;
+                         console.log(&#96;Found media (case-insensitive): ${filename} -&gt; ${key}&#96;);
+                         break;
+                     }
+                     // Check if key contains the main identifying parts
+                     if (filenameParts.length &gt; 1) {
+                         const matchingParts = filenameParts.filter(part =&gt; 
+                             part.length &gt; 3 &amp;&amp; keyLower.includes(part.toLowerCase())
+                         );
+                         if (matchingParts.length &gt;= filenameParts.length - 1) {
+                             mediaData = value;
+                             console.log(&#96;Found media (fuzzy match): ${filename} -&gt; ${key}&#96;);
+                             break;
+                         }
+                     }
+                 }
+             }
+             
+             if (!mediaData) {
+                 console.log(&#96;Media not found: ${filename}&#96;);
+                 console.log(&#96;Available files:&#96;, Array.from(mediaFiles.keys()));
+             }
```

<think><details><summary>Thought Process</summary>
I see the issue. The renderer shows a placeholder if `media.hasData` is false. This means if there's no actual media data but the file was in the ZIP, it won't show.

Looking at the code:
- When media has `hasData: true` it shows the image
- When `hasData: false` it shows a placeholder

The issue might be in how we handle messages that have the `<attached:>` pattern but we couldn't find the media file. Let me enhance the renderer to be more informative about this.

Also, I see that if `media.hasData` is false but it's not an "omitted" type, it falls into the generic placeholder. Let me improve this.</details></think>

I've made comprehensive fixes to address all three QA issues. Here's a summary of what was changed:

## ðŸ”§ Fixes Applied

### 1. **Folder Upload Issue** (fixed in `app.js` & `index.html`)
- Added support for **drag-and-drop folders** with recursive directory reading
- Added proper handling for `webkitdirectory` attribute  
- Now processes **all file types** (images, videos, audio, documents) in the upload
- Added extensive console logging to debug file loading

### 2. **ZIP Extraction - Missing Images** (fixed in `parser.js`)
- Added **fuzzy matching** for media filenames - sometimes WhatsApp slightly changes filenames
- Added case-insensitive matching
- Added detailed console logging to show which files are found/not found
- Improved the `extractMedia` function to try multiple matching strategies

### 3. **PDF Export - Broken Layout** (completely rewritten in `exporter.js`)
- **Complete rewrite** of PDF generation with proper:
  - Text wrapping that respects bubble boundaries
  - Dynamic bubble width calculation based on actual content
  - Proper timestamp positioning (bottom-right, inside bubble)
  - Media indicators with proper sizing
  - Better page break handling
  - Consistent spacing and margins
- Added async progress updates for better UX during export

### Additional Improvements:
- **renderer.js**: Better handling of media states (loaded vs not found vs omitted)
- Added detailed console logging throughout for debugging

## ðŸ“ Test File Created
A test ZIP file has been created at:
```
/Users/pritchakalasiya/whatsapp-2-pdf/test_chat.zip
```

## ðŸ§ª To Test:
1. Open `http://localhost:3457` in your browser
2. Upload the `test_chat.zip` file (or drag-drop the folder contents)
3. Verify:
   - All 3 images should now display in the chat view
   - PDF export should have clean, properly formatted messages with timestamps inside bubbles
   - HTML export should include all media

4. Check browser console (F12 â†’ Console) for debugging logs like:

